title: Manipur’s Thadou community celebrates 'Hun-Thadou Cultural Festival 2021’
description: Imphal, (Manipur) April 08 (ANI): Manipur’s second-largest community ‘Thadou’ celebrated 'Hun-Thadou Cultural Festival 2021’ at Brigadier Thomas Ground, Kangpokpi district in Imphal. The festival celebrates the germination and sprouting of seeds sown in the fields that bring forth new lease of life and hope. The event was organized by Thadou Cultural Festival Committee, under the aegis of Thadou Inpi General Head Quarter, the apex body of the community. The festival cheered with performances by cultural dances and live music.The beauty and brain competition among the Thadou youth through Mr and Miss Thadou contest was the main attractions of the fest. Tribal Affairs and Hills Minister Vungzagin Valte and Kangpokpi MLA Nemcha Kipgen were the chief guests and functional president of the opening session of the festival.

title: Manipur CM distributes environment-friendly autos to 65 beneficiaries
description: Imphal (Manipur), April 7 (ANI): To promote e-mobility in the state, Manipur Chief Minister N Biren Singh distributed e-autos to 65 beneficiaries including 9 women at an event held at Kangla in Imphal, Manipur on April 07. For betterment of environment, Singh stressed the need to replace all the diesel autos with e-autos by providing grants and loans from the Government. The monetary assistance of Rs. 1, 40,000 was granted to beneficiaries for the purchase of the e- rickshaw. The initiative is being taken by Manipur State Action Plan on Climate Change to curve the risks and vulnerabilities.
